answers.answer: Hi,are you on insulin?  You need to have very low carb diet and you need to be taking insulin properly.If you are in US I understand you can buy the old insulins (Humulin N and R over the counter in wallmart quite cheaply).  This will be better than none. You can also get cheaper meter and strips the same way.  I assume you do know how to use insulin properly.You need to check how you can get assistance.  Do you have a Dr?  Can you get access to any assistance.  Sounds like you might be in trouble with really high blood sugars.  Juice can make your sugars very high.

question: Hi, im 25 yrs old, i have had diabetes since i was 5 had it under control until turned 19 medical card got taken away from gov, thought I could keep it manageable but it's gotten way out of control all I want to do is drink(non alcohol) but not really water just like juice and stuff. Really hard to stop. Wat can I do?
title: Going crazy
